attributes.action: To abolish Political Parties and reintroduce monarchial rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All poltical parties are hopeless.
Lets try something different. Let's see if our Monarch can act in our best interests and get improvements in Health Care, Education and Foreign Policy for a trial period of 5 years.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
